review_text: Donna and Mike’s place is was exactly what we needed after driving all day. The view from the back porch was relaxing as we listened to the fire Mike had started for us. We saw deer and rabbits as the sun was setting. The cabin had everything we needed and the bed was very comfortable. When we travel back to NY, we will definitely try to stay again.
This was my third time staying here. It will not be my last.
Our stay was fantastic and the hosts were amazing.
Beautiful place and great value for the price. Host was very kind and accommodating

Donna was super responsive regarding booking and additional information. She was friendly and greeted us when we got there. The cabin is absolutely adorable and cozy and was very clean and comfortable. The property is absolutely beautiful and very private. We had dogs with us and she was very welcoming in this regard as well. Thank you, Donna! If we’re ever back in the area will be sure to book again!

haven’t stayed in a place that beats this place yet!
we woke up to the sound of roosters, a warm atmosphere, and a beautiful view. everything was just perfect.
thank you!
Great place to stay! Wish we stayed longer to explore more!
Amazing place to get away! Donna bakes the best cookies as well!

Adorable little place with friendly hosts.
The property is beautiful and the Cozy Cabin is comfortable and clean with lots of thoughtful touches including homemade cookies! We had a lovely mini-break and I wish we could have stayed longer. The chickens, ducks and goats were so fun to visit. Would definitely book again when in the area!

This was the best stay ever!!! We made friends for a lifetime!!! Mike and Donna were the best host I have had at an Air B n B!!! Place was absolutely beautiful! Relaxing and a shit ton of laughs!!! Most definitely be back!!!! We will be back!!!! Stealing that dam grill😂😂😂 thank you all so much!!!!
Another great stay at this lovely cozy cabin with a beautiful view! We look forward to returning this summer!

Donna met me as I arrived. She and Mike are so friendly, you can tell they enjoy hosting. Extra bonuses include the lovely farm animals, the beautiful view, and the peaceful setting. The cottage itself is so well made--by hand with gorgeous natural wood--and so well decorated. Probably Donna has thought of all the little amenities--homemade cookies in the refrigerator, for example. I couldn't have felt more welcome and taken care of.

The Cozy Cabin is such a sweet and quiet experience that fills the soul and provides a true feeling of serenity and peace.
View from the deck was like a picture. The cabin was charming and well decorated. Ducks, chickens, and goats add to the unique personality of the place. Early morning outdoor fire by Mike is extra special and his and Donna’s warmth and hospitality are beyond wonderful!

Donna and Mike were exceptional hosts, very welcoming and made you feel right at home upon meeting. The Cozy Cabin name matched equally with the feel of our stay. Wonderful place for a ladies getaway weekend! Highly recommend to outdoor enthusiasts or those looking for a getaway of relaxation and a list of zero to-do's.

We had a wonderful stay at Donna's place. Well appointed with everything you need for a comfortable stay. The place is charming, with lots of character, wonderful woodwork throughout. Situated in a peaceful setting, close to Ohio state parks offering hiking, biking, hunting, fishing.
Lovely location, cozy cabin, we felt right at home!
We had a lovely time spending the night in the Cozy Cabin. The views from their yard are beautiful and the cabin is so comfortable. Would recommend!
Great pit stop for our trip! Best hosts ever!!! They made us feel right at home!!

I spent three nights in the city and finally got rest in this amazing cosy cabin in the mountains. The view recharged my energy and peacefulness gave me a beautiful night sleep! Thank you Donna and Mike for this opportunity!!
Great stay, great people
Had a great overnight stay.. cabin was beautiful and the area was fantastic too. Great host
Donna and Mike were extremely kind and the place is cozy!

We had a great stay. Would highly recommend the cabin. Very clean and every detail well thought out. Hosts were great and showed us around. We have a 3 year old son who loved the loft. The host even provides a safety gate for the loft ladder so we could shut it off to our little one if needed.
Donna was great. Friendly, she met me at the door as I came in. Clear communication about expectations. Lovely setting. I appreciate her tolerance for my menagerie!
Another great stay! Always a relaxing and peaceful space. Thank you

Donna & Mike are excellent hosts! The cabin was sooo squeaky clean and smelled fresh. It's feels like you're in the middle of BFE (wonderful!), but you're so close to so much. We explored a few restaurants in Belpre but found Parkersburg to be most interesting. We found Filipino & Lebanese restaurants that were delicious. The Parkersburg Brewing Co. has tasty food and a wonderful selection of beers. We visited The Parkersburg Art Center, where they were displaying, for the first time ever, a collection of some of Billy Foster's work. You're probably not familiar with his art, but it's worth doing a little research.
Overall, we throughly enjoyed our visit and will be coming back again to visit Donna & Mike!

Our stay at Cozy Cabin was wonderful! The cabin had everything we needed for our pup, and a good nights rest on our road trip to Tennessee! We will definitely be back if passing through this area again.

Beautiful! Nicely decorated! Many nice finishing touches that made it special. Both Donna and Mike are gracious hosts. GREAT value for the money! Hope to see them again!
Colleen R

Donna and Mike greeted me on arrival and gave me the quick tour of the space. I ran to town for a quick bite and then came back to relax and watch a movie. The tiny cabin was very cozy with an electric fireplace that was great for the cold evening I stayed there. The bed was super comfortable as well. I couldn't believe all the additional space in the loft, so there is plenty of room if you have kids traveling with you. If the weather has been warmer I would have liked to hang outside on the deck, the area was private and relaxing.
This is such a beautiful spot. Very cozy and enjoyable. The host was responsive and everything was perfect!
The description of the place was exactly as described. It was cozy, clean, and enough for a night’s stay for a long road trip with kids.

The place was great. Donna and her husband greeted me as soon as I pulled in. Allowed us to use anything we wanted on the deck . The fire pit was definitely a plus. And those delicious cookies were the icing on the cake . Loved this place, I’d definitely book again

Donna greeted us when we arrived. She gave instructions about the cabin. It’s small but an incredible use of the space& beautifully built. We had our dog with us. There’s a small yard outside the cabin & we walked our dog around the farm & down the rural road for exercise.
The cabin was very clean & comfortable.

Beautiful location!!! Gorgeous cabin. Warm, cozy, and quaint. Exceptional workmanship!! Donna and Mike are amazing! Greeted us right away, and we're very attentive to anything we may need. We will be back!

Donna and Mike are phenomenal hosts, they went above and beyond to ensure our comfort in the cabin, and they provided fresh homemade cookies which were delicious! They communicated extremely well and were very willing to work with us on check-in and out times!
What a nice peaceful and Cozy Cabin.Donna was friendly, nice and helpful. I would again any time 😎

Great place and super hosts! Peaceful surroundings and super clean! Looking forward to staying again!!!
Thank you Donna for opening up your place to us!

Loved it! So cozy. Perfect for our wrestling tournaments in Parkersburg. My 7 year old son was so so happy with the loft beds and the fireplace heater. & I personally loved the fresh baked cookies when we arrived!! I forgot shampoo and body wash and there was everything I needed already stocked in the bathroom. Everything was perfect. We will definitely be back.

Wow! What a perfect little gem! We loved the cozy cabin with a great view. The cabin itself was beautifully constructed with attention to every detail to make for a perfect stay. And they are the epitome of dog friendly which my pups and I love. We'll be back this summer and look forward to using the lovely deck, grill, and fire pit.
Good place to stay for a few nights away
Very nice place, enjoyed the view very peaceful and really just felt like I was at home Donna and Mike treated us like family. Will definitely go back. Highly recommended.
Had a great stay at Donna & Mike's guesthouse. We felt right at home and enjoyed the peaceful surroundings. Everything was clean and cozy and super inviting!
Beautiful cozy cabin that was a great deal with a great host. Wonderful little get away. Donna went out of her way making us feel like home with plenty of amenities and thoughtfulness.
Traveling with a toddler is tough but Donna’s place was warm, inviting, and relaxing. Our whole family felt cozy and at home!
Great place, I would stay there again.

Donna and Mike were lovely. The cabin space was adorable and clean and communication was great. They were also very accommodating for early arrival. I love knowing this is so close to my mom so I have somewhere nice to stay when I visit :)

This is definitely one of my favorite airb&b’s I’ve ever stayed in. I cannot say enough good things. SO clean and comfortable. Cozy cabin is the perfect name for this place because it really is so cozy. We loved it so much we decided to stay a second night. Mike even built us a beautiful campfire. They made us feel right at home but we still had our privacy. So much wildlife around and the view from their property is lovely. We loved their sweet little goats! Well worth the value, would love to come back again in the future.

We were down for a hunting trip and this place was perfect. Very well maintained and clean. Mike was very friendly at check in. I will be staying here again if back in the area. I was very satisfied and really liked what they have done with the place.
Donna and Mike are fantastic hosts!

We stayed at Donna and Mike's place for just a night on our way through town and my only complaint is that we didn't stay longer. Donna and Mike really thought of everything to make their space feel welcoming and cozy and on top of that the view from their property is amazing. Thanks so much, we'll definitely be back and hopefully next time for longer!

This sweet gem is tucked away in the rolling hills and peaceful meadows of Ohio’s beautiful countryside. It’s a just-perfect cozy cabin complete with an awesome fire-pit! You’re going to see deer grazing in the meadow in the evenings and hear bluebirds in the morning while drinking your coffee on the beautiful deck outside your door. Mike & Donna are kind & friendly and have thought of everything. They are there if needed—yet with the perfect balance of giving you privacy as well.
Your accommodations are extremely clean ( super important to me) & honestly—you wont want to leave.
Restaurants, tourist attractions, & vintage shops are amazing & nearby- but (thankfully in my opinion) not walkable. However, evenings by the moonlight with s’mores and/or wine, and comfy chairs are right outside your door.
It’s one of those places that you know you will come back to. We were super happy & felt like we made new friends. It will be our go- to place when visiting beautiful Marietta.
Beautiful and cozy, just like the description. Everything was perfect!!

Cozy Cabin is a perfect name for this hillside retreat. Our 2 year old loved roaming the land and seeing the 🐐 and 🐔 🐥. You can tell upon arrival that Donna has been in hospitality for so long! She gave a great introduction to what was available and how to reach her with questions. Mike's attention to detail when building the cabin is also noted in how great the space is utilized. My hubby and I were so glad this was our choice for our 10 year wedding anniversary. The town also offers beautiful river views and parks. We used the local libraries wifi to download Bluey episodes since the cabin was without. In our spare time the games provided kept us entertained and the conversation flowing. Overall our time went by to quickly and we look forward to going back in the future.

We can’t thank Donna and Mike enough for offering their beautiful cabin to guests!! We are SO THANKFUL to have a place close to family that allows dogs, including large dogs. The place was so clean, and private! We would absolutely stay again next time we’re in visiting family! Donna and Mike were incredibly friendly also!

Overall, a very quiet and comfortable overnight stay. We would do it again. The location is slightly off the beaten path yet easy to get to. It’s in a very nice rural setting yet close enough to access restaurants, fuel and other necessities if so desired. Check in with Donna was a breeze as she personally went over the details of the cabin and things nearby.
The cabin itself was custom built by Mike for the grandchildren and it shows in the details — very nice! (Works well for full-size folks, too. I’m 6’-2”.)
Great stay at the cozy cabin! Very peaceful, clean, and exactly as advertised.

Donna and Mike were friendly hosts. The Cozy Cabin was well equipped, the setting was wonderful. Very relaxing and peaceful.They have animals, liked them. If you want a cushy bed may be disappointed. This a unique and peaceful place to stay.
Such a wonderful and relaxing stay! The beds were comfortable and so cozy!! Donna and Mike were very kind and personable and I would definitely stay here again!

Donna's cozy cabin was the perfect place for my stay during a very busy week. I loved sitting out by the fire looking over the beautiful view in the evening to unwind. The cabin was very comfortable and nicely decorated with all that was listed plus some extras. Donna and Mike were very friendly hosts who also give plenty of privacy. I would love to stay there again when I'm in the area.
I will sum it up this way: it will always be my first choice when I am in the area.
Wonderful place to stay with an awesome host. Will be staying there again in a couple day and every time I come this way.
The place is Breathtaking & Donna & Mike are Gods Great people. We will be back

Beautiful place in the country. Loved the view, sounds of nature, and peaceful vibe. Cabin was spotless. Donna was very responsive to questions and requests. I would stay here again or recommend to others.

We had an excellent one night stay here. It's a very quiet, comfortable, cozy little cabin in great condition. The view out the window is lovely, the hosts are generous in what they offer as options (use of grill, etc.), and we enjoyed the personal touches in the interior decor. Snacks (cookies, granola bars, etc.) and coffee/tea/water are provided; microwave, toaster oven, refrigerator and coffee maker in the room. The listing photos provide an accurate description. We had no trouble finding it at dusk (almost dark); heading out from the center of Belpre, look for the house number on the mailbox post. Recommended; we would stay there again if in the area. Thank you Mike & Donna.

Second stay of the week here. Spent an overnight on the way and on the way back during a road trip from Pennsylvania to Indiana. Super clean, comfortable, beautiful surroundings and genuinely nice people. One of our favorite Airbnb’s ever. Will definitely stay here again if/when in the area.

Great Americans with a truly amazing spot. Mike and my husband were instant friends. He is a true craftsmen. Thank you for the blackberry jelly. ❤️
We love this place and this family and will 💯 be back.
Good space, Donna was a great host, very clean and comfortable

If you’re looking for a quiet and relaxing place, this is it. It’s a small cabin, but feels bigger, and has everything you’ll need. The decor and details really make this cabin stand out. I only used the lower level bed and it was very comfortable. Plus, it’s SPOTLESS, the air conditioning was cold, and the homemade cookies were delicious. I hope it’s available next time I’m in the area.
Beautifully built cabin with a lovely view. Super comfortable bed, very welcoming hosts, everything we needed, and an awesome place to unwind after a day on the road.
Donna & Mike were wonderful hosts and helped us settle in right away. The place was cute and clean. Everything we needed for a nite.
I really enjoyed my stay at Donna's place. The place was very cozy and comfortable. The check in cookies were delicious! I will definitely come back the next time I am in the area.

Wonderful space with a beautiful view! Donna and Mike were great host from booking, to check-in, and throughout the stay. The home was definitely designed and put together with thought to make guest feel welcomed and comfortable. The small space did not feel small at all, with everything one needs for a getaway. Looking forward to staying again in the future when back in town!

In our “camping world” we would consider Mike & Donna’s cozy cabin basically “Outside Living” ! The cabin is handy dandy for anything you prefer to do “inside” otherwise it’s heavenly for the multitude of “outside living” ie: fire, deck, grilling, bird watching, wildlife spotting- you get the idea!
We call it heavenly!!
Mike & Donna did not disappoint either! Great people with a tank of hospitality! Wish we could’ve stayed longer!

Donna and Mike were very welcoming upon our arrival. Donna gave us a tour of the cabin and explained how things worked and where things were. Just super nice people. It was beautiful and peaceful. We had two dogs with us, and they had an area designated for them which was great. We would come back.
This place is truly a hidden gem! Donna and Michael were both very nice, friendly and helpful. Will DEFINITELY stay there again!

Donna's place is worth every penny and the trip to get to it which is off the beaten path. The surroundings are peaceful and refreshing with lots of privacy. They welcomed my pets and provided above and beyond amenities including breakfast items and fresh baked cookies!! If you are considering booking this place don't hesitate your won't regret it!!!

This cozy cabin was the perfect getaway and we wish we could have stayed more than one night! Hosts were amazing - made us fires and even ran to the store to get ingredients for s’mores for us. Very peaceful and great scenery. We loved everything about this cabin and hope to be back!

Beautiful little cabin with a beautiful view. We wanted an "off the beaten path" place to stay...we got it. It was a great place. Clean. Comfortable. Quiet.
Was nice to meet Donna at check-in. Everything worked perfectly for us...thank you.
Very nice and quiet and the perfect getaway.

The place is wonderful. It has that cabin feel both inside and out. Great view and very relaxing. Although we were only stopping through I highly recommend this place to get away and relax at a great location with a great host. Also not to mention some welcome treats.
It's an incredibly beautiful location and a prefect place to stay. Quite, comfortable, clean and has everything you need. Much better then anything s hotel has to offer.

I've been on AirBnB a long time, and my stay at Donna's place just might be my favorite trip yet. The house is tucked away in the foothills of Belpre, OH, but is not difficult to find. Once we arrived, Donna and her husband were right there to assist with check-in. Throughout the stay they provided everything we could possibly need, including local recommendations. The unit itself was spotless and exceptionally comfortable, and stocked with everything we might need.
We just can't say enough of how peaceful the AirBnB was, nor how helpful and accommodating our hosts were. If we're in the area again, we'll probably look for this listing first. Amazing value and a great experience!
family loved the hospitality that was given.

Absolutely loved Donna and Mike's place! They were there to greet us upon arrival and gave us a brief intro and made a special spot for our motorcycles to park. They were available as needed but gave us plenty of privacy. The cabin felt like a home away from home and was extremely peaceful and cozy. Donna made us cookies and provided us with water, coffee and snacks. Their place is just enough off the highway to be peaceful and quiet while still only 10-15 min from great restaurants and town. We would gladly stay here again and highly recommend!
Nice, comfy stay. Very cozy cabin!
Great place to unwind! My husband and I were very impressed with this Airbnb.
Great space and host. All matched what you see in photos.
Great little cabin to stay & sleep while we were passing through the area.

Donna was very hospitable and made sure I had everything I needed for my stay. Here cabin was lovely, well stocked and very clean. I enjoyed sitting on the porch, viewing the beautiful scenery and enjoying the peace and quiet.

Great folks
Nice place on top of the hill

Donna noted that most GPS do what ours did and bring you in back roads and past some uncared for places. You can stay on paved roads. I think if you put in Boxers Bed and Breakfast it will take you to the good end of her road and then put in her address.
Donna likes to communicate. She is very helpful. This trip came at a difficult time in our life and she made it better. Thank you.
Donna’s place was awesome. The lil cabin was exactly as she described. They were awesome hosts and the surroundings were beautiful.
The first place I have stayed that is as described and clean. Would definitely stay here again. They drive to the place was a little interesting in the rain but so worth it.

We were only in town for the night, to see my Mom for Mother’s Day. I wish we could have stayed longer!! Mike & Donna were exceptional hosts, they met with us upon check in, and walked us through everything. They even made delicious fresh homemade cookies for us! They also built the cabin themselves, and it was beautifully crafted with wonderful attention to detail. Would 10 out of 10 recommend anyone to stay here while visiting Little Hocking, Belpre, Marietta or Parkersburg/Vienna. Away from it all but a short and beautiful drive to any of these locations. It truly is a complete peaceful sanctuary to rest, and take in the beauty of its surroundings, while still being close to everything the MOV has to offer.

Donna’s place was so great! It was exactly as described & the place was so peaceful!
Their hospitality is top notch & they truly thought of everything necessary! The small details of the cabin were incredible, & we loved the homemade cookies!
We would highly recommend this cozy cabin for a stay!
The cozy cabin was great. Very clean and well equipped. Communications were great. I enjoyed my stay and would definitely return.
Cute, cozy little cabin. It was perfect for what we needed for the weekend and Donna was extremely nice and helpful!

My husband, my daughter and I wanted a peaceful getaway for a quick overnight. This was the perfect stay! The cabin was absolutely beautiful and the view was perfect. You can tell how much time and love they put into this cabin.
Mike and Donna are extremely kind and helpful and were amazing hosts! They were available when we needed and answered all of our questions. They even offered suggestions of places to go if we wanted to explore the area.
We loved our stay and will definitely be back!!

Everything is as advertised and is a beautiful tiny home/guest house with a beautiful location. Lots to do in the immediate area. Mike/Donna are very accommodating and responsive. They accommodated our weird check-in time and we had an open dialogue for the entirety of the stay. Snacks and Water was provided which is very thoughtful and appreciated. Overall our stay was amazing and we would recommend it to anyone thinking of booking
Again very nice stay would most definitely recommend to anyone looking for a quiet cozy place!
Cozy place with a nice view. Hosts are very friendly.
Donna and her husband were super sweet and helpful! They made us feel at home for sure! Would most definitely recommend this place anybody.

We had an absolutely wonderful stay at this Air Bnb! The cabin is beautifully decorated, and the host was top-notch. The beds were comfortable and the views were breathtaking. We also appreciated the quick responses to any questions we had. We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful and relaxing stay! Thanks again!

We just signed in to a Doubletree Hilton in Cleveland for the second part of our trip and it's depressing compared to Cozy Cabin. We miss it so much! Everything was perfect. If you want to relax in beautiful home with amazing views and a huge deck in Southeast Ohio this is the place for you. A lot of love, care and craftspersonship went into creating the Cozy Cabin and it shows! We plan to make this our home away from home every time we visit family in the area. Dog and kid friendly too!

We had a great stay at the cozy cabin! Donna and Mike were great and super accommodating. The cabin has a great setup. Very well crafted and laid out, beautiful views and a quiet setting. It was a much needed get away for me and the wife for a day!!!
Thanks again!
The hard rain on the roof kept us from a good night's rest. Not the host's responsibility.

We stayed at the Cozy Cabin for just one night on our way to WV and we really loved it. It was cozy, simple, affordable with a beautiful view. The Cabin as well as the space for entertainment outside were well thought out and admirable. We loved the cookies and were also grateful to be able to bring our dogs and being able to get them out on a short walk on the less travel country road. We would most definitely stay again and hope to have more time next time.
Super cozy cabin with beautiful views atop the rolling hills of Southeast Ohio. Lovely little touches like a plate of homemade cookies and extra blankets.

Donna and Mike were great hosts and made my stay relaxing and easy. I would definitely recommend their place and I will definitely stay there again. Ending the day with a sunset and a fire, and starting my day - after a comfortable sleep - with coffee and a sunrise over an incredible view from the deck was rejuvenating. I would recommend this stay to anyone wanting to get away and find a unique stay.

Donna's cozy cabin is beautiful! It's even better in person than it is in the pictures. Donna and Mike are wonderful hosts, Donna's cookies are amazing. The cabin had lots of little extras like snacks, coffee and teas. The cabin is extremely clean and very cozy. Donna and Mike made us feel very welcome. We had a wonderful weekend and I'm very glad we chose Donna's Cozy Cabin... I highly recommend the Cozy Cabin!
This is an absolutely beautiful cabin! Everything that you could possibly need during your stay was provided. There was bottled water, snacks, extra blankets for the bed. Nothing was lacking!
I loved staying at Donnas place! It’s super cozy and the view is amazing there!! Perfect for a little weekend getaway and super close to cool places!!
It was very comfortable an would definitely come stay again
Fantastic true county getaway! Loved the unique touches and handmade with love feel. Can’t wait to return!
Wonderful stay at Donna's place. Host(s) were extremely kind and I had everything I needed. Would definitely visit again in the future.

Great place to stay! The cabin kept us warm and dry from the the cold and stormy nights that hit us. My young sons had fun and loved the cabin, but they were too young for us to comfortably allow them upstairs. There wasn’t a gate or a guard upstairs to protect toddlers from possibly falling down the ladder. The hubby and I slept upstairs and it offered us some much needed privacy. All of the beds were comfortable, but the best part was Donna and her husband. They were welcoming, friendly, and great to chat with. Donna always answered her phone promptly when I would ask about something or make a request. I would love to stay again next year!

This Cozy Cabin exceeded all of our expectations. Cozy is an understatement! It is charming, well crafted, and perfectly decorated. It’s perfect for a weekend get away from the hustle and bustle. Cabin came well supplied by the friendly and amazing hosts. They made the stay so memorable and went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed.
We will definitely be back!
Such a sweet place! Warm, cozy, so homey. Wish I could have stayed longer BEAUTIFUL views!
If six stars were possible I would give this six stars. Wonderful cabins and hospitality. Even better than expected.

Oh my, Can’t begin to express how great our stay was and the tremendous hospitality of our hosts! Loved the scenery, great discussions, and cozy space! Highly recommend staying here and plan to visit again!
Great place to stay!!
One of my best stays! Donna and Mike make you feel like family. They go above and beyond what is expected. Five stars on everything! Highly recommend!!!!🤍🤍
A perfect setting. Perfect hosts. Zero complaints!

We enjoyed our stay at the Tiny House in Belpre,OH. The House with beautifully furnished and the view of the valley gorgeous. When we arrived the hosts greeted us and showed us around. There were ample snacks to enjoy and a coffeemaker and toaster oven for making breakfast. We had to leave early the next day,but next time hope to stay longer.

This place is a 10/10! Beautiful views and very relaxing. My dog and I did some hiking in West Virginia and spend the day in Marietta. It was wonderful. And the freshly baked cookies were a nice bonus!!
The view is beautiful. Country setting close to the city. Donna and Mike were awesome.

Nice place! Wonderful woodwork! Small but cozy! If you like being away from it all for a few days this place is great! Good deal too! Thanks for being a good host and tell Mike he is a true craftsman!
A wonderful way to create another life experience. It brought us a bit of wonder and joy.

If you are looking for a peaceful night in the mountains don't look any farther. This was one of the most comfortable nights away from home I have ever had. It's a great place to unplug from the busy hustle and bustle of every day life. The little cabin was very clean. I will definitely be back but will stay longer next time.

Wow. I’ve stayed in so many Airbnbs over the years. And Mike and Donna take the cake in terms of hospitality. The cookies were beyond amazing. They both respected our privacy and let us build a fire with their firewood. The cabin looks even better than the pictures. The WiFi was a little spotty, but it only helped our group detach and enjoy the space how it was meant to be enjoyed. At peace. Can’t say enough great things about this spot and Donna & Mike

The cabin was a perfect little getaway for our vacation! Donna greeted us as we arrived and was kind and hospitable. The view was incredible and almost every amenity was provided. Donna even left cookies in the room for our arrival! We really enjoyed sitting outside and using the fire pit.
We stayed here during the Mothman festival in Pt Pleasant, WV. It was under an hour away when all other hotels were booked. Definitely check this place out if you’re making festival plans.
Beautiful place to stay warm hospitality and very friendly. Will be staying there again .
You’ll want to stay for the cookies!! Lovely views, safe and spotless. Really enjoyed my stay.
Cute place, and the view was great. Donna and Mike are great hosts

Mike and Donna are absolutely wonderful! They made our stay extra special. Everything was as described, and they go over and beyond to make you feel welcome. Mike is a true Craftsman and Donna a wonderful cook. I can't say enough about them. If you are thinking about booking, don't hesitate.

We have stayed at quite a few locations now and can say that without a doubt Donna and Mike have gone above and beyond to ensure you have an excellent stay. The cabin is immaculate and exceedingly well furnished and stocked. Mike is a talented woodworker and did a beautiful job in designing and building the cabin. It is in a quiet peaceful country setting. We really enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend it.
My son and I had a great stay . Donna and Mike were more than welcoming and helpful. They even went out of way to get special treats. Thanks for the wonderful stay

No detail is overlooked, as a guest you will be sure to have what you need. An extra special touch was being greeted with an outdoor fire and homemade cookies on arrival. Great stay, would give six stars if I could

Our stay was comfortable and peaceful. Our hosts were great and only as far as a quick knock on the door.
In just one night, you just can't explore all of the opportunities afforded at this lovely, cozy cottage.

Our amazing stay with Mike & Donna will be one to remember forever. Their warm welcome, beautiful cabin, amazing property, and fantastic food recommendations made our “mini-moon” extra special. We cannot wait to stay with them again. 11/10 recommend this property for the value!

Mike and Donna's cabin was so perfect! The place was well laid out and thoughtfully stocked. There's a beautiful view outside the front deck and a nice drive up to the cabin. There are tons of things to do about 10-20 minutes away and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Stayed an extra day because we loved it so much!

The hosts are amazing and kind and the cabin is beautiful and peaceful. They thought of every detail. Id pay much more for this place - such a steal. Dont miss the opportunity to use the grill outside! We will definitely be back!

Mike and Donna's Cozy Cabin was a perfect place for us to stay...we only wish we could have stayed longer. Everything was great! The cabin was spotlessly clean, the decor was cute, the bed comfortable, the AC kept the cabin cool, (even on a very hot day), coffee, tea, hot chocolate, etc. were provided...and homemade chocolate chip cookies were waiting for us! The view from the deck outside the cabin was fantastic. And the location was an easy drive to the surrounding towns, just the right distance away from town to feel like you have some space, but not so far away to feel isolated. Overall, just a great stay. We highly recommend!!

My stay was just what I was looking for - a cozy, relaxing getaway! This property was beautiful and quiet which made it easy to unwind and enjoy the views. The cabin was cleanly and comfortable. I appreciated all of the details, and the hosts were great!
